lore: Djinn owners realized too late that these creatures twisted their words as much as possible to grant wishes that caused some damage.\n\nWhen a Djinn Illusionist touches a magic item, it steals its energy and stores it for itself. In this way, it can make others see things that are not really there, playing with their emotions and thoughts to manipulate them and make them distrust their friends and colleagues.
menagerieDialog: Make a wish. The only rule is that you can't wish for more wishes.
The most powerful weapon is deceit. You'd do well to remember that.
I don't trust Everett. I think it's because his haircut is terrible.
Make a wish, then blow out the fire on my head.
Your creatures would be nothing without my support. You're welcome.
name: Djinn Illusionist
